Please refer to rental car options below and call us to discuss other car categories 9 Day/8 Night Quintessential England , Self-Drive The perfect destination to travel by road, England is a land of contrasts offering both idyllic countryside and vibrant urban centres just waiting to be explored; from the country lanes of the Cotswolds, Lake District and Yorkshire Dales to the elegant parades and cobbled streets of historic cities such as Bath. Your England drives will be punctuated with historic landmarks such as ancient castles and elegant country estates. Standard Room (8 Nights) Travel Dates: 1 Jan - 31 Mar 26 & 1 Oct - 14 Dec 26 Twin per person fr $2,342 Travel Dates: 1 Sep - 30 Sep 26 Twin per person fr $2,458 Travel Dates: 1 Aug - 31 Aug 26 Twin per person fr $2,590 Travel Dates: 1 Jul - 31 Jul 26 Twin per person fr $2,520 Travel Dates: 1 Jun - 30 Jun 26 Twin per person fr $2,470 Travel Dates: 1 Apr - 30 Apr 26 Twin per person fr $2,384 Travel Dates: 1 May - 31 May 26 Twin per person fr $2,438 Note: Car hire is not included, please add preferred car option for a minimum of 9 days. Includes 9 days/8 nights 9 Day Quintessential England Self Drive - 2 nights at Gloucester Robinswood Hotel, Cotswolds area (3 star) or similar - 1 night at Lansdowne Grove Hotel, Bath (3 star) or similar - 2 nights at Penmere Manor Hotel, Cornwall (3 star) or similar - 1 night at Best Western Hotel Rembrandt, Dorset area (3 star) or similar - 2 nights at Best Western Rose and Crown Hotel, Kent area (3 star) or similar - Breakfast daily - Admission to Roman Baths and Leeds Castle Per Person, from $2,342 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 31 Mar 2026. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Jan 2026 to 14 Dec 2026 (unless otherwise specified).A surcharge may apply for stays over event dates, please enquire for more info. Please note there is limited availability on the advertised room types and all pricing is subject to change until a reservation is confirmed. Inventory & availability can change on a daily basis. All components are strictly subject to availability. Land only - please add on your best available airfares. Car hire is additional to tours. A selection of rental car costs has been included which can be added to the self drive tours. NOTE: Cost is Per Rental Per Day. Rental Requirements: - A minimum of one year valid driver's license for cars and two years for vans from country of origin must be presented at time of rental. - A Photo ID featuring a recognisable photo taken in the last 10 years. Avis will accept a passport or driver's license if it contains a photo, a national identity card or any other form of government-issued identification. - Proof of address may also be required - This could include a recent utility bill or bank statement. Driver's license will not be accepted as proof of address. - Any additional drivers must meet the same requirements. - Reservations must be made 2 days in advance. Age Requirements: - Minimum 23 years of age. - Drivers who are aged between 23-25 will be charged the young driver surcharge of GBP40.00 per day including VAT, capped at 10 days per 28 day hire. - Young drivers can only rent car groups A, B, C, E, I and M and must have 1 years driving experience. Additional Driver Requirements: - There is an additional fee for authorised additional drivers. This is to be paid directly to Avis at the time of rental. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: 07 OCt 25.
